skills.title: Wordpress
skills.description: Custom theme & plugin development, WooCommerce integration, responsive design and performance optimization, and security hardening for scalable, SEO-friendly websites.

skills.title: QA
skills.description: Ensure software quality through systematic testing—identifying bugs, improving performance, and safeguarding user experience before release.

skills.title: UI & UX Design
skills.description: User-centered interfaces, wireframing & prototyping. Focus on usability, accessibility & clean aesthetics.

skills.title: Webflow Development
skills.description: Custom, responsive websites with clean code, CMS integration, and dynamic interactions—built visually in Webflow.

portfolio.title: Al-Sebaie
portfolio.description: WordPress site built with Elementor & Royal Addons, featuring responsive Figma design. Used CPT UI + ACF for dynamic content, MetForms for forms, and Polylang for multilingual support.

portfolio.title: Memari
portfolio.description: WordPress site built with Elementor & Royal Addons, featuring responsive Figma design. Used CPT UI + ACF for dynamic content, MetForms for forms, and Polylang for multilingual support.

portfolio.title: Nice Move
portfolio.description: Built a clean, responsive website for Nice Move using Webflow. Utilized its visual designer for pixel-perfect layouts, responsive controls for all devices, CMS for easy content updates, and interactions to enhance user experience. The site is fast, secure, and SEO-friendly.

portfolio.title: Smart Wave
portfolio.description: Built Smartwave's responsive website with Webflow, featuring pixel-perfect design, smooth animations, and intuitive CMS for optimal cross-device UX.

portfolio.title: Mobiler Pflegedienst St. Agnes
portfolio.description: Built a WordPress site for Mobiler Pflegedienst St. Agnes (German mobile nursing/day care) using Elementor, MetForm, and GDPR/security plugins. Showcases services and 2026 facility launch.

portfolio.title: Kahlgrunder Pflegedienst GmbH
portfolio.description: Built with Elementor for responsive design, MetForm for contact forms, and Complianz/CCM19 for GDPR compliance. Secured with Really Simple SSL for safe browsing.

portfolio.title: Tagespflege St. Agnes GmbH
portfolio.description: WordPress site for Seligenstadt elderly day care (2026) built with Elementor PRO, MetForm, and CCM19 for GDPR compliance.

portfolio.title: Beam Pro
portfolio.description: WordPress site built with Elementor & Royal Addons, featuring responsive Figma design. Used CPT UI + ACF for dynamic content, MetForms for forms, and MetTranslate for translation.

testimonial.description: During his employment at HNNDES, Thameen Kronfli was responsible for the following job duties:Developing and customizing WordPress themes and plugins to meet client requirements.Conducting thorough Quality Assurance (QA) testing, including functional, usability, and performance testing.Implementing best practices for SEO, website speed optimization, and accessibility.He is a sincere, honest, hardworking, dedicated employee with a professional attitude and very good job knowledge.

Throughout his tenure with us, Thameen has proven to be an outstanding professional in his field. His exceptional attention to detail, accuracy, and efficiency in handling data have significantly contributed to the success of our project. His ability to manage large volumes of information while ensuring precision has been truly commendable. Moreover, Thameen has exhibited excellent teamwork and collaboration skills. He has always been highly cooperative, supportive, and eager to assist his colleagues, making him an invaluable member of our organization. His dedication and commitment to the project's objectives have greatly enhanced our ability to serve the community effectively.

During his time with us, Thameen consistently demonstrated a high level of professionalism, dedication, and initiative. As a Promoter, he showed excellent communication skills and a strong ability to engage customers, helping to significantly boost our product visibility and customer satisfaction. Due to his outstanding performance, he was quickly promoted to the role of Supervisor, where he effectively led his team, managed operations, and maintained a positive work environment.Thameen’s reliability, leadership, and strong work ethic made him a valuable asset to our team. He consistently met and exceeded expectations, and his contributions played an important role in achieving our departmental goals.

A devoted member of our church and an individual of outstanding character and integrity. Thameen has been an active and committed servant within our community, demonstrating exceptional leadership as the head of the church's scouting group. His dedication to guiding and mentoring young scouts reflects his strong moral values, sense of responsibility, and ability to inspire.
testimonial.author_name: Scout of Saint Anthony the Great Church

about.title: Software Engineer
about.text: Software Engineer specializing in WordPress development, data analysis, and machine learning.I build responsive, user-centric web solutions while leveraging data-driven insights to create impactful applications. Passionate about merging technical expertise with innovation to solve real-world problems and deliver measurable results. Always exploring cutting-edge technologies to drive meaningful solutions.

about.title: Scout Chief
about.text: Scout Chief, having guided a group of over 100 members for more than four years, demonstrating strong leadership and organizational skills. I am also a passionate musician, playing the trumpet with dedication and skill for over ten years. My commitment to both community leadership and musical artistry reflects my well-rounded, disciplined, and talented nature.
